Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that are eventually followed by Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Frequency of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE in variants that include Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases

Name: Number of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that are not followed by any rejection activity (e.g., Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER, Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION, etc.)
Metric: Number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not occur

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that lead to a successful end (i.e., Payment Handled) without any intermediate rejection
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE in the most frequent variant (Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE → Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION → Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR → Request Payment → Payment Handled)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that are followed by Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER instead of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that occur after a prior rejection by any role (including Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER)
Metric: Number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' activities

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that belong to cases with total Amount above 100 euros
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE in variants where the pre-approver is involved (either approving or rejecting)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that are part of re-submission loops (i.e., preceded by any Declaration REJECTED activity)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases

Name: Ratio of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE leading to Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER over those leading to Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that are directly followed by Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR (bypassing pre-approval and administration)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Frequency of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE in variants that end without reaching Payment Handled
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases where 'Payment Handled' does not happen

Name: Percentage of all Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER that are preceded by Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE (which is always true, but quantifies exposure)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Average number of times Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE appears per case in variants involving PRE_APPROVER rejection
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that initiate a process path including at least one approval step before any rejection
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE that are followed within the same case by a second Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE (indicating resubmission after rejection)
Metric: Number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' activities

Name: Percentage of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE in 2018 that result in Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER compared to 2017
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE performed per year (2017 vs 2018)
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'", 'aggregation': 'total', 'group_by': 'time:timestamp'}"
